# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*.pyo

# Virtual environments
venv/
.venv/
env/
ENV/

# VS Code and PyCharm
.vscode/
.idea/

# Log files (store sensitive encrypted logs here, do NOT upload to GitHub)
logs/

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Miscellaneous
*.swp
*.swo

# Ignore screenshots generated by decryptor
decrypted_screenshot_*.png

# Encryption key (OPTIONAL: uncomment next line if you never want to track your key)
# encryption.key
